Happy Birthday, [PlayerName]! I hope you have a special day.
[PlayerName], Did you make a wish for your birthday?
Happy Birthday, [PlayerName]!
[PlayerName], I hope you have the best birthday ever!!!
Happy Birthday, [PlayerName]! Have a great day.
It's your birthday, [PlayerName]! Are you having a party?
Hello, [PlayerName]. Nice to see you!
Hi [PlayerName]!!
What's going on [PlayerName]?
Hello [PlayerName]. What fun things do you have planned today?
Are you ready to jump into JumpStart, [PlayerName]?
Good seeing you, [PlayerName]!
Congrats [PlayerName], you just earned the [Achievement] ribbon.

What a great job, [PlayerName], for earning yourself the [Achievement] ribbon.

A Ribbon for [Achievement]! Congrats [PlayerName]!
Lovely day, isn’t it?
Nice to see your face around here.
What's it going to be today, my friend?
Got a lot planned today?
Can't beat a day playing JumpStart.
I'm so happy you're here!
Congrats [PlayerName], you just earned the [Achievement] trophy.
I see you just received the [Achievement] trophy, [PlayerName].

[PlayerName], you're amazing for earning the [Achievement] trophy.

Need an underwater adventure? Why don't you visit MarineLand.
Check out the shops. There are always new pets, rides and clothes to buy.
Hi, Justin Dweeber here. I can do cool hand dances! SuperSecret rocks, just like one of my concerts! Check it out.
Have you checked out Rodeo Racing? Cool cars and fast times. Check it out in the Quicklaunch.
Hi I'm Justin. To earn Style Bucks, play the Arcade games in the Quicklaunch. You can buy furniture and clothing with the money you earn!
Did you know you can raise a dragon in Enchanted Sanctuary. Just go to the Adventure Lounge.
Have you rocked out in Club SuperSecret? Dancing, a Fashion Show, and a live band! I hope they book Justin Dweeber in there soon!
There's some really cool pets inside Madame Wu's Secret Emporium! Make sure you check 'em out!
Hi, I'm Justin Dweeber and I love SuperSecret. Have you checked out your Penthouse?
Monthly special here, get the monthly special!
Special of the month just for you, click here.
Special of the month here, Just a click away.
Get your monthly special, a deal you can't refuse. Just click on the hamburger stand.
